_sText:
Cloak - Bomb/Defuse

by Ald√©z
http://www.aldez.tk/


Introduction
Terrorists have found out that a chemical plant stores their illegal substances in the sewers of an industrial estate. They will try to blow up one of the storage rooms to pollute the water with the extremly toxic substances.

Terrorists' mission:
Detonate the C4 in one of the three storage rooms or eliminate all counter-terrorists.

Counter-Terrorists' mission:
Prevent the terrorists from polluting the water by eliminating all of them or diffuse their C4.


Thanks:
- Orion team for their tree model (http://www.orion-project.net/index.php).
- Dimension Studios (http://www.dimensionstudios.org/)
- All the testers of the map.
